com.centurylink.mdw.activity.types

Interface GeneralActivity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdapterActivity, EventWaitActivity, FinishActivity, InvokeProcessActivity, NotificationActivity, RuleActivity, ScriptActivity, StartActivity, SynchronizationActivity, TaskActivity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEvaluator, AbstractWait, AdapterActivityBase, AutoFormManualTaskActivity, BaseActivity, ConnectionPoolAdapter, CrossmapActivity, CustomManualTaskActivity, DefaultActivityImpl, DocumentWebServiceAdapter, DynamicJavaActivity, EmailNotificationActivity, EventCheckActivity, EventWaitActivity, FileWriterAdapter, HttpServiceAdapter, InvokeHeterogeneousProcessActivity, InvokeProcessActivityBase, InvokeSubProcessActivity, JdbcSqlAdapter, JmsAdapter, LdapAdapter, ManualTaskActivity, MdwRpcWebServiceAdapter, MultiRestServiceAdapter, OAuthServiceAdapter, PoolableAdapterBase, ProcessFinishActivity, ProcessStartActivity, PublishEventMessage, PublishEventMessageRest, RestServiceAdapter, ScriptEvaluator, ScriptExecutorActivity, SlackNotificationAdapter, SoapWebServiceAdapter, SocketAdapter, SynchronizationActivity, TimerWaitActivity, TransformActivity, VelocityTemplateActivity

    public interface GeneralActivity
    Baseline controlled activity interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      This method will be deprecated soon.
      java.lang.Object execute(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
      Executes the workflow activity.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        java.lang.Object execute(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
                  throws ActivityException
        Executes the workflow activity. This method is the main method that subclasses need to override. The implementation in the default implementation does nothing.
        Returns:
        the activity result (aka completion code)
        Throws:
        ActivityException

      • execute

        void execute()
      throws ActivityException
        This method will be deprecated soon. The preferred method to override is the execute() that takes an ActivityRuntimeContext and returns Object.
        Throws:
        ActivityException
